concept.title: Preparation of pump and slot die setup

conbody.p: Preparation of pump and slot die setup are:

ol.li: The Mixing room personnel and a "Spill" team will make all plumbing connections to the Zenith Delivery pumps. They also deliver the slurry mixing vessels to the Coating room
They will stay in the Coating room (prepared as a "spill" team) until the Operators have wetted the plumbing loop and Zenith Delivery pumps safely.
the Coater Operators will mount and adjust the Slot Die and Zenith Delivery pumps onto the Coater.

entry.p: Role of the Coater Operators is to mount and adjust the Slot Die and Zenith Delivery pumps onto the Coater.
The Operators are NOT responsible for bringing the "Slurry" (coating liquid) from the mixing room into the Coating room.
